author: Jason Fang, Samuel Yang And Bang Xiao
title: 'China die': Racist vandals target Chinese-Australian family's home in Melbourne
description: Vandals target a Chinese-Australian family's home two nights in a row, leaving their garage covered in racist graffiti about the coronavirus pandemic, and one of their windows smashed with a large rock.
content:
Posted 
April 22, 2020 04:45:00
A Chinese-Australian family's home has been targeted by vandals for two nights in a row, leaving their garage covered in racist graffiti about the coronavirus pandemic, and one of their windows smashed with a large rock.
